mil7.6.6:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘satapattassa ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.6.6:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, satapatto ravitva paresam khemam va bhayam va acikkhati;
mil7.6.6:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena paresam dhammam desayamanena vinipatam bhayato dassayitabbam, nibbanam khemato dassayitabbam.
mil7.6.6:1.4: Idam, maharaja, satapattassa ekam angam gahetabbam.
